plugins.name: skillport-manager
plugins.description: Install skills from Skillport marketplaces for Claude.ai and Claude Desktop.

plugins.name: skillport-code-manager
plugins.description: Install skills from Skillport marketplaces for Claude Code.

plugins.name: data-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyze CSV and JSON data files with statistical summaries and visualizations

plugins.name: soil-data-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyzes soil test data with specialized agronomic insights, nutrient assessments, pH analysis, and fertility recommendations.

plugins.name: word-pair-swap
plugins.description: Swaps adjacent word pairs in text. Use when users ask to swap word pairs, swap every two words, or perform pairwise word swapping on text input.

plugins.name: csv-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyze CSV files and generate insights, statistics, and visualizations.

plugins.name: meeting-digest
plugins.description: Generate concise, actionable summaries from Fireflies meeting transcripts. Creates weekly digests, extracts action items, and highlights key decisions.

plugins.name: git-commit-generator
plugins.description: Generate well-structured conventional commit messages by analyzing git diffs

plugins.name: catchup
plugins.description: Restore Claude's context after conversation reset. Gathers git status, recent commits, PRs, and checkpoints in one call.

plugins.name: example-skill
plugins.description: An example skill demonstrating the Skillport format.
